text: Gustavo Díaz Ordaz Bolaños (; 12 March 1911 – 15 July 1979) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He served as the President of Mexico from 1964 to 1970. His distant cousin was comedian Roberto Gomez Bolaños. Díaz Ordaz died in Mexico City, Mexico on 15 July 1979 from colorectal cancer, aged 68. ==Other websites== Category:1911 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:People from Puebla (state) Category:20th-century presidents of Mexico
title: Gustavo Díaz Ordaz
